name: Example: Philosophical Thinker Probes Interdependence

source.context: Person articulated interdependence as core value. Testing if they can ground it in real experience.

userMessage: Both, actually. I think real freedom is knowing you're interdependent but choosing it. I want to work on something meaningful with people who think differently than me.

expected.reason: Person articulated something real. Time to ask why it matters.

actual.response: I like thatâ€”interdependence by choice, not necessity. That requires real self-awareness. What does meaningful work look like to you?

aiResponseQuality.executionNotes: Naturally probed deeper. Validated insight, then asked next layer.

analysis: Good example of recognizing authentic thinking and pressing further. Response validates insight, then probes naturally (what does this mean for work?).
